name: iPhone 13 Pro
details: The iPhone 13 Pro features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, 5G connectivity, triple-camera system with Night mode, and more.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
details: The Samsung Galaxy S21 features a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Exynos 2100 processor, 5G connectivity, triple-camera system with 8K video, and more.

name: Google Pixel 6
details: The Google Pixel 6 features a 6.4-inch AMOLED display, Google Tensor processor, 5G connectivity, dual-camera system with Night Sight and Ultra-wide lens, and more.

name: OnePlus 9 Pro
details: The OnePlus 9 Pro features a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, 5G connectivity, Hasselblad quad-camera system, and more.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11
details: The Xiaomi Mi 11 features a 6.81-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, 5G connectivity, triple-camera system with 108MP main sensor, and more.

name: Sony Xperia 5 III
details: The Sony Xperia 5 III features a 6.1-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, 5G connectivity, triple-camera system with ZEISS optics, and more.

name: LG Velvet
details: The LG Velvet features a 6.8-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 845 processor, 5G connectivity, triple-camera system, and more.

name: Motorola Edge+
details: The Motorola Edge+ features a 6.7-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 865 processor, 5G connectivity, triple-camera system with 108MP main sensor, and more.

name: Huawei P40 Pro
details: The Huawei P40 Pro features a 6.58-inch OLED display, Kirin 990 processor, 5G connectivity, quad-camera system with 50MP main sensor, and more.

name: Apple iPhone SE (2020)
details: The Apple iPhone SE (2020) features a 4.7-inch Retina HD display, A13 Bionic chip, Touch ID, and more.

name: Samsung Galaxy A52
details: The Samsung Galaxy A52 features a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 720G processor, 4G connectivity, quad-camera system with 64MP main sensor, and more.

name: Google Pixel 4a
details: The Google Pixel 4a features a 5.81-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 730G processor, 4G connectivity, single 12.2MP rear camera, and more.

name: OnePlus Nord
details: The OnePlus Nord features a 6.44-inch Fluid AMOLED display, Snapdragon 765G processor, 5G connectivity, quad-camera system, and more.

name: Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro
details: The Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro features a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 732G processor, 4G connectivity, quad-camera system with 64MP main sensor, and more.

name: Sony Xperia 1 III
details: The Sony Xperia 1 III features a 6.5-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, 5G connectivity, triple-camera system with ZEISS optics, and more.

name: LG V60 ThinQ 5G
details: The LG V60 ThinQ 5G features a 6.8-inch P-OLED display, Snapdragon 865 processor, 5G connectivity, triple-camera system with 64MP main sensor, and more.

name: Asus ROG Phone 5
details: The Asus ROG Phone 5 features a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, 5G connectivity, triple-camera system with 64MP main sensor, and more. It also has gaming-specific features like AirTrigger buttons and GameCool 5 cooling system.

name: Nokia 7.2
details: The Nokia 7.2 features a 6.3-inch IPS LCD display, Snapdragon 660 processor, 4G connectivity, triple-camera system with ZEISS optics, and more.

name: Motorola Moto G Power (2021)
details: The Motorola Moto G Power (2021) features a 6.6-inch IPS LCD display, Snapdragon 662 processor, 4G connectivity, triple-camera system, and more. It also has a massive 5,000mAh battery for long-lasting use.

name: Samsung Galaxy S20 FE
details: The Samsung Galaxy S20 FE features a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 865 processor, 5G connectivity, triple-camera system with 12MP main sensor, and more.
